description: 一 means one. It's the simplest kanji with just one stroke.
memoryHint: Picture it as a single finger holding up the number one.

description: 日 represents the sun or a day. It looks like a window with the sun shining through.
memoryHint: Imagine a square window with a sun inside it.
mnemonic: A square with a line in the middle looks like a window showing the sun.

description: 人 represents a person standing with legs apart.
memoryHint: Looks like a person walking or standing.

description: 大 looks like a person with arms outstretched to show how big something is.
memoryHint: A person stretching arms wide to show 'big'.
mnemonic: Person (人) with arms wide open = BIG!

description: 小 shows three small marks, representing something tiny.
memoryHint: Three small droplets or grains of rice.

description: 中 shows a line going through the middle of a box.
memoryHint: A target with an arrow through the center.
mnemonic: Box with line through middle = center.

description: 年 originally depicted a person carrying harvested grain on their shoulders, representing a year's harvest.
memoryHint: Think of someone carrying the harvest at year's end.
mnemonic: Person (千) carrying grain = end of year harvest.

description: 本 shows a tree (木) with a mark at the bottom indicating the root or origin.
memoryHint: A tree with roots showing its origin.

description: 月 represents the crescent moon shape.
火 depicts flames rising up.
水 shows flowing water with a central stream and splashes.
memoryHint: Looks like flowing water with splashes.

description: 木 shows a tree with roots and branches.
memoryHint: Looks like a tree with roots and branches.
mnemonic: Tree with roots and branches = tree.

description: 金 shows a gold nugget being extracted from the ground.
memoryHint: Imagine gold nuggets in the ground.

description: 土 shows a mound of earth or soil.
memoryHint: Looks like a pile of soil.

description: 見 shows an eye (目) on legs, representing someone going to see something.
memoryHint: An eye on legs going to see something.
mnemonic: Eye (目) with legs = going to see.

description: 行 shows a crossroads where people go in different directions.
時 combines sun (日) and temple (寺), indicating measuring time by the sun's position relative to temples.
memoryHint: Temple measuring time by the sun.

description: 生 shows a plant sprouting from the earth, representing life and growth.
memoryHint: Plant sprouting from soil = new life.

description: 学 shows a roof (宀) over a child (子) learning with hands (爻).
memoryHint: Child under roof with books learning.
mnemonic: Child (子) under roof (宀) learning = study.

description: 校 combines tree (木) and cross (交), originally meaning to compare or examine, now used for school.
memoryHint: Under the trees where students gather = school.
mnemonic: Tree (木) + cross (交) = place of examination (school).

description: 上 shows something above a line.
下 shows something below a line.
今 shows the present moment under a roof.
memoryHint: The present moment captured under shelter.

description: 気 shows rising steam or vapor, representing energy and spirit.
語 combines words (言) and five (五) mouths (口), suggesting many people speaking.
出 shows a plant growing out of the ground.
memoryHint: Plant emerging from soil = coming out.
mnemonic: Plant coming out of ground = exit/emerge.

description: 入 shows something going into a container.
先 shows a person (儿) walking ahead with something in hand (土).
名 combines evening (夕) and mouth (口), as in ancient times people announced names at evening gatherings.
memoryHint: Announcing name with mouth in evening.

description: 女 shows a woman kneeling or sitting politely.
男 combines field (田) and strength (力), as men traditionally worked in fields.
子 shows a baby with outstretched arms.
父 shows a hand holding a rod or tool, representing authority.
母 shows a woman (女) with two dots representing breasts, emphasizing motherhood.
友 shows two hands helping each other.
口 represents the shape of a mouth.
目 shows an eye with eyelashes.
耳 shows the shape of an ear.
手 shows the shape of a hand with fingers.
足 shows a person standing with emphasis on the foot.
山 shows three mountain peaks.
川 shows flowing water.
田 shows a rice field divided into sections.
車 shows a cart with wheels.
電 combines rain (雨) and lightning (申), representing electricity.
話 combines tongue (舌) and words (言), representing speaking.

examples.meaning: to hear / to listen / to ask

description: 聞 shows an ear (耳) at a gate (門), listening to what's outside.
食 shows a person bending over a bowl of rice.
飲 combines eat (食) and lack (欠), originally meaning to drink when food is lacking.
読 combines words (言) and sell (売), as reading was originally associated with interpreting merchant accounts.
書 shows a hand holding a brush over paper.
来 shows a person arriving between trees.

examples.meaning: to rest / to take a break

description: 休 shows a person (人) resting against a tree (木).
駅 combines horse (馬) and exchange (尺), originally a place to change horses.
店 shows a building (广) with goods inside (占).
町 combines field (田) and street (丁), representing a town with fields and streets.
外 shows evening (夕) and divination (卜), as divination was done outside at evening.
間 shows a gate (門) with the sun (日) visible through it, representing space between.
memoryHint: Sun seen through gate = space between.

description: 家 shows a roof (宀) over a pig (豕), as ancient houses kept livestock inside.
会 shows people coming together under a roof.
社 combines earth (土) and altar (示), originally meaning earth altar or shrine.
国 shows a boundary (囗) protecting jade (玉), representing a country protecting its treasures.
円 shows a round shape, originally representing a round coin.
高 shows a tall building with multiple stories.
安 shows a woman (女) under a roof (宀), representing peace and safety at home.
新 combines stand (立), tree (木), and axe (斤), representing cutting down a tree to start something new.
memoryHint: Cutting tree to make something new.

description: 古 shows ten (十) generations in the past (口), representing old age.
多 shows two evenings (夕夕), as evenings repeat many times.
少 shows small (小) divided, emphasizing small quantity.
前 shows a boat (舟) moving forward on water.
後 shows someone walking (彳) and dragging feet (幺), being slow and behind.
左 shows a hand (ナ) working (工), as most people work with their left hand supporting.
右 shows a hand (ナ) over a mouth (口), as right hand feeds the mouth.
長 shows a person with long hair, representing length.
半 shows an ox (牛) divided in half.
分 shows a knife (刀) dividing something into eight (八) parts.
時 combines sun (日) and temple (寺), indicating measuring time by the sun's position relative to temples.
memoryHint: Temple measuring time by the sun.

description: 毎 originally meant 'mother', but now means 'every', as a mother cares for every child.
mnemonic: Mother figure = cares for every one.

description: 週 combines enclosure (周) and movement (辶), representing a cycle that moves around.
早 shows the sun (日) rising over the horizon (十), representing early morning.
朝 shows the sun (日) rising between plants (草) and moon (月) still visible.
memoryHint: Sun rising, moon still visible = morning.

description: 昼 shows the sun (日) at its highest point (尺), representing noon.
夜 shows a person (イ) under evening sky (夕) with dots representing stars.
memoryHint: Person under evening sky with stars.
composition: 亠 + イ + 夕 + 丶

description: 東 shows the sun (日) rising through trees (木), representing east.
西 shows a bird settling in its nest at sunset, representing west where the sun sets.
memoryHint: Bird in nest at sunset = west.

description: 南 shows a house facing south with plants growing well in the sunlight.
北 shows two people back to back, as north is the opposite of south.
memoryHint: Two people back to back = opposite directions (north vs south).
mnemonic: Back to back = north (opposite of south).

description: 白 shows the sun rising with a beam of light, representing whiteness.
黒 shows a chimney with soot, representing black color.
赤 shows fire (火) over earth (土), as red clay is baked by fire.
memoryHint: Fire over earth = red (like fired clay).

description: 青 shows plants (生) growing under clear sky (月), representing blue/green.
色 shows a person (巴) bending over to look at something (ク), examining its color.
好 combines woman (女) and child (子), as women naturally like children.
悪 combines heart (心) and not good (亜), representing bad feelings.
新 combines stand (立), tree (木), and axe (斤), representing cutting down a tree to start something new.
memoryHint: Cutting tree to make something new.

description: 旧 shows a bird (隹) perched on something old.
強 combines insect (虫) and bow (弓), as some insects have strong resilience.
弱 shows two weak bows (弓弓) with feathers (冫), representing weakness.
病 shows a sick person (丙) in bed (疒).
院 combines building (阝) and complete (完), representing a complete building for an institution.
